participant_1.background:
I love the flexibility my job provides me with because it allows me to spend time with my family and still have a successful career.
I am a hard worker who enjoys being active but struggles with weight loss.
I sometimes think I am too busy to keep up with my family, but I try my best because I love them.
i live in the city.
i have freckles all over my face.

participant_2.background:
I treasure my collection of vintage horror movies, which I love to watch with my grandchildren.
i love to go outside at night and eavesdrop on my neighbors arguments.
i like fitness.
I love adrenaline rushes and pushing myself to the limit.
i moved to ny to study in a prestigious designing school.

content.text: Not much, just watching some old horror movies with my grandchildren.
That sounds fun! Do you have a lot of grandchildren?
Yes I have 5 grandchildren. I love spending time with them.
That's so sweet! I only have one grandchild.
That's still great! Grandchildren are a blessing.
Yes they are. I love to spoil them.
Me too! They always make me laugh.
What is your favorite thing to do with your grandchildren?
I love to read to them, take them to the park, and play games with them.
Those all sound like great activities! I am sure your grandchildren love spending time with you.
They do! I am so lucky to have them in my life
